project_abstract.cdata: The Ningbo Water and Environment Project for China aims at facilitating the expansion and quality of water and wastewater services in Ningbo City and Cixi City in an economically efficient and environmentally sustainable manner, thereby protecting public health, improving the environment, and supporting economic growth. The project has the following three components: Component 1) includes: (i) raw water supply line consisting of an intake tower in Jiaokou reservoir and a 9.6 km tunnel; (ii) 500,000 m3/d Maojiaping water treatment plant; and (iii) treated water transmission pipes, including a new 47 km ring main around Ningbo City, and 29 kms of transmission pipes from Maojiaping water treatment plant to the new ring main. Component 2) includes: (i) two wastewater treatment plants, one located in the north of Cixi (100,000 m3/d) and one in the east (50,000 m3/d); and (ii) associated collection system mains and link sewers (230 km of pipe and 58 pump stations). The component will provide comprehensive wastewater services for all urban areas in Cixi City, and help protect Hangzhou Bay. Component 3) Technical assistance will be provided to improve water planning, utility price and service regulation, and enhance NWSC and CMSC operational and business management capacities. Design review and construction management technical assistance will also be provided to ensure smooth implementation of the infrastructure works.

P086505.projectinfo:
<![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>宁波水环境管理项目 </ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>项目包括三个子项目：
子项目一：宁波供水。本子项目包括：1）原水供给线，包括皎口水库的一座取水塔和9.6公里长的隧道;  2）处理能力为500000立方米/天的毛家坪水处理厂；3）处理后的水输送管道，包括47公里长的新建环城干管和从毛家坪水处理厂到环城干管总长为29公里的输水管道。作为宁波市总体规划的重要组成部分，本子项目将通过新取水源改善水质、提高污水处理率以及提高输送系统的可靠性和灵活性。
子项目二：慈溪污水处理。本子项目包括：1）两座污水处理厂；2）配套收集系统主干和污水连接管道。本子项目将向慈溪全市提供综合污水服务，并有助于保护杭州湾。
子项目三：机构发展。本子项目将提供技术援助，以加强供水规划、提高供水使用价格、改进服务管理以及提高宁波供水公司和慈溪污水公司的运营和经营管理能力。为确保基础设施工程的顺利实施，本子项目也将提供设计审查和施工管理技术援助。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
